location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:162 x 100 mm, on sheet 235 x 155 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Dehra Dun. S.D.O. 3938. 2-25.Distinctive Features:Outline map showing the area east of Kut-Al-Amara [Al-Kūt] produced to illustrate the movements of British military forces on the 17th April 1916 with position of various infantry brigades and direction of counter attack by Turkish forces marked.
